data.title: Feintool
data.meta_description:
Feintool | 6,343 followers on LinkedIn. Achieving new dimensions together with fineblanking, forming and e-lamination stamping. | Feintool is an international technology and market leader in electrolamination stamping, fineblanking, and forming. We manufacture high-quality precision parts in large volumes from steel.

We supply the automotive industry, energy infrastructure equipment providers, and all manner of high-end industrial manufacturers.

Realize new automotive seating system concepts in record time. Our fineblanking expertise can dramatically speed up the time to market, especially during the design and prototyping phase of new seating systems. To learn more about our solutions for automotive seating systems, visit our website at www.feintool.com/seating #SeatingComponents #SeatEngineering #AutomotiveSeating

Seating adjustment mechanisms designed for quality production. With the cost structure of a stamping process. Automotive manufacturers are under tremendous pressure to increase volume and reduce costs. Fineblanking achieves the net shape tolerances of a machined process with the cost structure of a stamping process. To learn more about our solutions for automotive seating systems, visit our website at www.feintool.com/seating #SeatingComponents #SeatEngineering #AutomotiveSeating
